alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 29 at 2:11PM AKST until January 31 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Wind chills to 55 below. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
